text: Aur jis shaks ne apne waldain se kaha “ Uff, tang kar diya tumne” kya tum mujhe yeh khauff dilate ho ke main marne ke baad phir qabar se nikala jaunga halanke mujh se pehle bahut si nasalein(generations) guzar chuki hain ( unmein se to koi uth kar na aaya)”Maa aur baap Allah ki duhayi dekar kehte hain “ arey badnaseeb ,maan ja , Allah ka waada saccha hai”. Magar woh kehta hai “ yeh sab agle waqton ki farsuda(fables) kahaniyan hai”
